nodes.text: The First Imperial Bank of Core, or simply First Imperial Bank, was a financial institution. Members of the Nimbanese species were highly visible employees for the bank.

During the Galactic Civil War, the White Thranta criminal Durr Roddack owned the account A37TDX41. After killing Roddack, a spacer transferred all the content of his bank account to his own, in the First Galactic Bank of Ord Mantell.
